description: Oriental hornbeam (Carpinus orientalis) is an amazing plant species because it has multiple unique features. It is a deciduous tree known for its remarkable durability and resistance to drought and disease. Its leaves are deep green in color and have veins which a distinct, zig-zag pattern. The bark of the tree is a unique and interesting light gray in color, and its nuts are typically small and dark in color. Oriental hornbeam is a great addition to any garden as it is both hardy and visually eye-catching, making it an excellent choice for landscaping. It is also a good choice for areas of the garden that are in need of a touch of shade and color. For these reasons, the Oriental Hornbeam is an amazing plant species.
